articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Congo
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Congo
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a message of greetings to Denis Sassou Nguesso, president of Congo, on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of its independence.
					 Sincerely wishing the steady development and prosperity to friendly Congo, Kim in the message expressed belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the common interests.

articles.title: Notice Sent to President of S. Korean Red Cross
articles.content:
Notice Sent to President of S. Korean Red Cross
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Jang Jae On, chairman of the Central Committee of the Red Cross Society of the DPRK, sent a notice to Ryu Jong Ha, president of the Red Cross of south Korea Saturday.
					 The chairman notified the south side of the fact that Rev. Han Sang Ryol, pro-reunification champion of south Korea staying in Pyongyang, is expected to go back to south Korea via Panmunjom at 3 p.m. on August 20.
					
					 In this connection, he asked the south Korean Red Cross to inform relevant institution of this so that it may take necessary measures.

articles.title: Japanese Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Japanese Delegation Arrives
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Japanese Society for the Study of the Juche Idea led by Seiichi Sakugawa, president of the National Liaison Council of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea, arrived here today by air.

articles.title: Reception Given at Russian Consulate General in Chongjin
articles.content:
Reception Given at Russian Consulate General in Chongjin
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The Russian consulate general in Chongjin gave a reception on Saturday to mark the 65th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Present there on invitation were officials concerned. The consul general and staff members of the Russian Consulate General in Chongjin and a delegation of veterans of the Maritime Territory of Russia were on hand. 
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: National Mass Consumption Goods Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
National Mass Consumption Goods Exhibition Opens
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- A national mass consumption goods exhibition was opened with due ceremony at the Central Light Industrial Sample Exhibition on Saturday.
					On display there are more than 34,000 consumer goods including cloth, footwear, ready-made clothes, daily necessities and foodstuffs produced by light industrial factories across the country and daily necessaries production units of industrial establishments under ministries and national institutions.
					
					 Such events as fairs of different sectors and dissemination of new technologies will be conducted during the exhibition.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were officials, scientists, technicians and workers from mass consumption goods production units in the capital city and local areas.

articles.title: Pyongyang Int'l Invitational Table Tennis Held
articles.content:
Pyongyang Int'l Invitational Table Tennis Held
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The 24th Pyongyang International Invitational Table Tennis Tournament was held at the Table Tennis Gymnasium in Chongchun Street here from August 9 to 13.
					 It brought together the teams of China, Russia, Mongolia and the DPRK (groups A and B) and the participants competed in male and female team events, singles and doubles.
					
					 The group A of the DPRK came first, China second and the group B of the DPRK third in the male and female team events.
					
					 Jang Song Man of the DPRK finished first, Lin Gaoyuan of China second and Ri Chol Guk and Kim Hyok Bong of the DPRK third in male singles.
					
					 Cheng Dandan of China finished first, Kim Hye Song of the DPRK second and Zhao Yan and Zhang Qiang of China third in female singles.
					
					 The title of male doubles was taken by Lin Gaoyuan and Yun Hang of China and the title of female doubles by Yi Fangxian and Zhao Yan of China.

articles.title: Light Comedy "Echo of Mountain" Staged in Hamhung
articles.content:
Light Comedy "Echo of Mountain" Staged in Hamhung
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The performance of light comedy "Echo of Mountain", a winner of Kim Il Sung Prize, began in Hamhung of South Hamgyong Province on Saturday.
					 Present to enjoy the premiere at the Hamhung Grand Theatre were leading officials of party, power organs and working people's organizations, officials in the fields of literature and art and media and people of different walks of life in the province.
					
					 The comedy shows the noble spiritual world and the indomitable working spirit of the people in the era of Chollima who brought their beautiful ideal and dreams for the prosperity of the country into reality by their own efforts. 
					
					 The performance was acclaimed by the audience for its high ideological and artistic value and the successful presentation of peculiar acting of the performers.
					
					  The performance goes on.

articles.title: DPRK Proves Successful in World Shooting Championship
articles.content:
DPRK Proves Successful in World Shooting Championship
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Korean players bagged a gold medal and two silver medals at the 50th World Shooting Championship of the International Shooting Sports Federation.
					 The championship brought together at least 2,400 male and female players from 98 countries and regions. They competed in various events.
					
					 Jo Yong Chol came first in the 10m rapid-fire air rifle event in the male individual adult group while Ri Hyang Sim placed second in the same event and in the 10m normal speed fire air rifle event in the young individual female group.

articles.title: Japanese Public Figure Interviewed
articles.content:
Japanese Public Figure Interviewed
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Professor at Doshisha University Kenichi Asano, a social figure of Japan, was interviewed by KCNA in Pyongyang on Friday.
					 He recalled that the Japanese imperialists fabricated the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty" on August 22, 1910, pursuing a colonial rule over Korea and committing countless crimes against the Korean people. 
					
					 Referring to the fact that he participated in the meeting for hearing testimonies made by victims of the crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists against humanity held in Pyongyang on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the defeat of the Japanese imperialists and the centenary of the fabrication of the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty," he said he felt strong remorse and disgrace as a Japanese national.
					
					 Noting that the Japanese government has refused even to apologize for the crimes Japan committed against the Korean people in the past,  he declared that it is a legal and ethical obligation to be fulfilled by Japan urgently to settle its past crimes.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The Japanese government should recognize as early as possible the responsibility for the misfortune and pain inflicted upon the Korean people, make an apology to the surviving victims, the dead and their bereaved families and all other Koreans and redress its crime-woven past.
					
					 It should drop its hostile policy toward the DPRK and stop at once its unreasonable suppression of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and Koreans there.
					
					 I will as ever join all other peace-loving Japanese from all walks of life in positive activities to normalize the relations between the two countries and support Korea's reunification.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Revered as Liberator of Nation
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Revered as Liberator of Nation
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- August 15 is the 65th anniversary of the liberation of the Korean nation from Japan's colonial rule by President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Japanese imperialists occupied Korea by force of arms early in the 20th century and pursued a colonial enslavement policy, inflicting enormous human, spiritual and material losses, great sufferings and misfortune on the Korean people. 
					
					 Kim Il Sung, worried about the destiny of the nation subjected to their harsh suppression, founded revolutionary armed forces in his twenties and fought against them with arms.
					
					 In the hard-fought struggle, he created unique and superb strategies and tactics to strike a heavy blow to the enemy. 
					
					 Many legends about the feats he performed in the anti-Japanese armed struggle are still told in the country.
					
					 As the country was liberated by him, the destiny of the nation could be saved from the fall and Korea, which had suffered an eclipse on the world map, is now well known as the homeland of Juche, a powerful socialist state.
					
					 Therefore, the Korean people have deeply revered the President through generations as liberator and great father of the nation.

articles.title: US Call for Stronger Military Alliance Blasted
articles.content:
US Call for Stronger Military Alliance Blasted
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is now becoming increasingly vocal for stronger "alliance" with south Korea and Japan these days. This precisely means escalated moves for knocking into shape a triangular military alliance, a nexus for aggression against the DPRK.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 The daily cites facts to prove that the triangular military alliance involving the U.S., Japan and south Korea has been in the making since the era of the Cold War.
					
					 It is the invariable scenario of the U.S. to round off the formation of the above-said military alliance to legally use Japan and south Korea as shock brigades for carrying out its strategy for invading the DPRK, it says and goes on:
					
					 After branding the DPRK as "a dangerous state" and "a hostile state" and adopting it as a policy to stifle it by force of arms, the U.S. imperialists seek to use Japan and south Korean puppet forces as shock forces in achieving their objective.
					
					 Though the above-said military alliance has not been formally proclaimed, it actually exists and is briskly operating. Herein lie the potential danger and gravity of the alliance stepped up by the U.S. with such increased zeal. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialists have already worked out a "joint operation plan" simulating "a contingency" on the Korean Peninsula with Japan while they have drafted with south Korea scenarios for a war of aggression against the DPRK and rounded them off.
					
					 The basic aim sought by the U.S. imperialists in its Asia-Pacific strategy is to provoke a nuclear war against the DPRK, to begin with, with south Korea as a springboard and then attack countries in this region by putting the above-said military alliance into motion and mobilizing a united force of its members in a bid to realize its scenario for aggression.

articles.title: S. Korean Group's Sycophancy towards US Flayed
articles.content:
S. Korean Group's Sycophancy towards US Flayed
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Officials in charge of "sanctions against the north" of the U.S. Department of State and the Department of Treasury, during their recent tour of south Korea, pressurized south Korea to join the U.S. in the sanctions against Iran and demanded it freeze the funds at the Seoul branch of Mellate Bank of Iran as a primary target of sanctions. 
					 The decision made by the conservative group to do so in pursuance of the U.S. policy is sparking great furor.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 The collusion and tie-up that took place between the U.S. and the puppet group over the sanctions against Iran were prompted by their master-servant relationship and a product of the despicable deal made because of the bilateral interests.
					
					 The ulterior intention of the U.S. is to use south Korea as a shock brigade in applying sanctions against Iran in return for meeting the request made by the puppet group for tightening the "sanctions against the north", while going reckless in its moves to stifle fellow countrymen.
					
					 The above-said behavior of the puppet group betrayed once again its true colors as top class lackeys of the U.S. who unhesitatingly meet any demand of their master for stifling fellow countrymen though it is harmful to them. 
					
					 Those forsaken by the country and the nation are without exception bound to seek a way out in depending on outside forces. But this will bring them nothing but disgrace, damage and insult. 
					
					 He who digs a pit for others falls into it. For its pursuance of the U.S. policy, the group has been thrown into such a miserable position. 
					
					 In order to realize its ambition to escalate the confrontation with countrymen the puppet group joined the U.S. in applying sanctions against Iran, even allowing itself to suffer a huge economic loss.
					
					 The more tightly the group of traitors clings to the coattails of outside forces, the bitterer hatred and resentment it will touch off among the south Koreans and other fellow countrymen and the further it will precipitate its self-destruction.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservative Forces' Merger Blasted
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservative Forces' Merger Blasted
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The "Solidarity of Hope for Future" and the "Grand National Party", conservative political parties which have so far existed separately in south Korea, decided to merge into one. This is nothing but a challenge to history as it is an act of swimming against the people's desire for independence, democracy and reunification and the trend of the times. Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in a signed article.
					 The conservative forces' organizational merger is a reactionary offensive aimed at holding in check the just advance of the popular masses and blocking the progressive development of the society, the article notes, and goes on: 
					
					 The pro-American conservative regime appeared in south Korea at a time when the south Korean people were dynamically pushing ahead with the movement for national reunification under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration in demand of a new policy and a new life. 
					
					 The conservative forces of south Korea have pursued a treacherous policy, crying out for recovering the "lost decade", thereby rendering the south Korean society more dependent on the U.S., reviving the fascist dictatorial system and getting frantic with the moves to escalate confrontation with fellow countrymen and provoke a war against the DPRK. 
					
					 The "Solidarity of Hope for Future's" decision to join the ruling forces in their treacherous moves threw graver hurdles in the way of the struggle of the south Korean progressive and democratic forces to achieve independence, democracy and reunification. 
					
					 A big alliance of conservatives, the reactionaries of history, is a product of their sinister plot to tide over their ruling crisis and lay a springboard from which to stay in power. 
					
					 Finding it hard to weather the crisis and stay in power with the force of the GNP only, the group of traitors opted for bringing the solidarity into its fold. The group of the solidarity is keen to satisfy its greed for power with the backing of the GNP.  
					
					 It is the inevitability of history that the old is bound to go to ruin while the new is sure to emerge victorious. 
					
					 The big alliance of conservatives in south Korea has no future as it is a merger of the groups of traitors forsaken by the country and the nation.

articles.title: Document Proving "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty" Disclosed
articles.content:
Document Proving "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty" Disclosed
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- A document proving the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty" totally null and void was disclosed, according to south Korean Yonhap News on August 11.
					 The text of a royal edict of the Japanese side preserved in the State Archives in Tokyo confirmed that the royal edict in which the Japanese king proclaimed the "Korea-Japan annexation" on August 29, 1910 had a state seal and his signature. 
					
					 But the text of the royal instruction released by Emperor Sunjong had neither state seal nor signature. It had only a royal seal which was used to approve administrative issues. 
					
					 The texts of the above-said treaty thus contradicted to each other in style and contents. This proves that the assertion of the Japanese authorities that "Korea-Japan annexation" was "legally made with the approval of Emperor Sunjong" was a lie and the "treaty" was null and void in the light of international law. 
					
					 Terauchi, "resident-general" of Korea, when giving Ri Wan Yong, pro-Japanese lackey, "a paper" on appointing him as the delegate vested with full authority to conclude the "treaty" on August 22, 1910,  instructed him to wrest ratification from the emperor.  
					
					 They thus cooked up the treaty and distributed a "royal instruction" announcing the "annexation" on August 29.

articles.title: Japan Urged to Stop Discrimination against Koreans
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Stop Discrimination against Koreans
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Representatives of the Kyoto Society of Koreans in Japan for Investigation into History visited the Kyoto Prefectural Office building on August 4 to convey a written request demanding the Japanese authorities roll back the policy of discrimination against the Koreans in Japan and opt for properly settling its past crimes.
					 In the written request they noted that not only public circles of Japan but also the UN Commission for Eliminating Racial Discrimination and others expressed concern about the Japanese government's intention to exclude Korean schools from the tuition-waiver program for senior high schools.
					
					 They demanded the authorities of Kyoto Prefecture take measures to ensure that the Japanese government stops discriminating against Koreans in Japan. 
					
					 Referring to the fact that the investigation into remains of Korean victims in Kyoto is at stalemate in the prefecture, they urged the authorities to make effective investigation and immediately return the remains to bereaved families.
					
					 A lot of artifacts of Korea were looted and vandalized during the Japanese imperialists' colonial occupation, they said, and went on: the authorities of the prefecture should look into the background against which historic relics kept in temples, museums and art galleries in Kyoto brought to Japan and return them to Korea.
					
					 They stressed the need for the authorities of Kyoto Prefecture to make efforts for Japan's settlement of its past crimes.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Mexico
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution" was brought out in booklet by the Morelos branch of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism on August 6. 
					The work, published on Jan. 29, Juche 92 (2003), clarifies the idea that the Songun revolutionary line and the Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea are a powerful political mode in the present era which carried forward and developed President Kim Il Sung's idea and line of giving importance to the army and a scientific revolutionary line and political mode that most correctly reflect the requirements of the times and the revolution. It also refers to the validity and advantages of the Songun politics and its great vitality.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a bulletin titled "Leader and Guards Unit" carrying the photo of General Secretary Kim Jong Il inspecting a unit of the Korean People's Army on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of his start of Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The bulletin said in an article that he visited Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on several occasions since he started his Songun revolutionary leadership by inspecting the division on Aug. 25, 1960. It cited facts to explain that the division performed feats in the battle for the liberation of Seoul during the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 Under the loving care of Kim Jong Il the division has been fully prepared as a matchless tank unit capable of beating back any formidable enemy, it noted, and continued:
					
					 He inspected a unit of the division at the outset of this year. This was a manifestation of his unshakable will to strenuously advance the cause of socialism with the might of Songun.
					
					 The DPRK will as ever display the might of Songun as it has a lot of guards units such as the division.

articles.title: Presidente del CC de la ACR envia otro aviso a su homologo surcoreano
articles.content:
Presidente del CC de la ACR envia otro aviso a su homologo surcoreano
Pyongyang, 14 de agosto (ATCC) -- El presidente del Comite Central de la Asociacion de la Cruz Roja de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Jang Jae On, envio el dia 14 un aviso al presidente de la Sociedad de la Cruz Roja del Sur de Corea, Ryu Jong Ha.
					El aviso notifica que el pastor surcoreano pro-reunificacion Han Sang Ryol, quien permanece ahora en Pyongyang, pospuso para las 3 de la tarde del dia 20 su regreso por via de Phanmunjom.
					
					Formula deseos de que la Sociedad de la Cruz Roja del Sur de Corea informe la tardanza al organo correspondiente para que se tomen las medidas necesarias.

articles.title: Inaugurada exposicion nacional de articulos de consumo popular
articles.content:
Inaugurada exposicion nacional de articulos de consumo popular
Pyongyang, 14 de agosto (ATCC) -- Quedo inaugurada en Corea la Exposicion Nacional de Articulos de Consumo Popular.
					Fueron exhibidos en la ocasion mas de 34 mil poductos tales como las telas, zapatos, ropas, articulos de uso diario y alimentos producidos en las fabricas de industria ligera y las unidades productoras de los articulos de primera necesidad de las fabricas y empresas, adscritas a los ministerios y organos centrales, en distintas localidades del pais.
					
					Durante la exposicion, se realizaran varias actividades como la evaluacion de articulos por sectores y la divulgacion de nuevas tecnologias.
					
					En el acto de apertura, que tuvo lugar el dia 14 en el pabellon central de las muestras de productos de la industria ligera, estuvieron presentes los funcionarios, cientificos, tecnicos y trabajadores de las unidades centrales y locales para la produccion de los articulos de consumo popular.

articles.title: XXIV Torneo Internacional de Tenis de Mesa por Invitacion de Pyongyang
articles.content:
XXIV Torneo Internacional de Tenis de Mesa por Invitacion de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 14 de agosto (ATCC) -- El XXIV Torneo Internacional de Tenis de Mesa por Invitacion de Pyongyang tuvo lugar del dia 9 al 13 en el capitalino Centro de Tenis de Mesa en el reparto Chongchun.
					En la ocasion los equipos de China, Rusia, Mongolia y Corea (grupos A y B) realizaron los juegos colectivos, simples y dobles de ambos sexos.
					
					El primer lugar en la prueba colectiva de ambos sexos correspondio al grupo A de Corea y los segundo y tercer lugares, al equipo de China y el grupo B de Corea, respectivamente.
					
					Mientras tanto, en el juego simple masculino el coreano Jang Song Man ocupo el primer lugar, el chino Lin Gaoyuan, el segundo lugar, asi como los coreanos Ri Chol Guk y Kim Hyok Bong, el tercer lugar.
					
					Por otra parte, en el femenino la china Cheng Dandan y la coreana Kim Hye Song ocuparon el primer y segundo lugares, respectivamente, y las chinas Zhao Yan y Zhang Qiang, el tercer lugar.
					
					Sobresalieron en el doble masculino los chinos Lin Gaoyuan y Yun Hang, y en el doble femenino, las chinas Yi Fangxian y Zhao Yan.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia la alianza militar tripartita
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia la alianza militar tripartita
Pyongyang, 14 de agosto (ATCC) -- El fortalecimiento de las "relaciones de alianza" con el Sur de Corea y Japon, de que Estados Unidos habla con bombo y platillo en estos dias, significa la confabulacion agresiva y la fabricacion de la alianza militar tripartita contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido este sabado y continua:
					
					Hay muchos datos reveladores de que el establecimiento de la alianza militar tripartita entre EE.UU., Japon y Sur de Corea comenzo ya en la epoca de guerra fria.
					
					Sigue invariable el intento de EE.UU. de usar legalmente a Japon y el Sur de Corea como brigadas de choque por la realizacion de la estrategia de agresion a la RPDC al formar aquella alianza.
					
					EE.UU. trazo como su politica aplastar por via militar a la RPDC definiendola como "Estado peligroso y hostil".
					
					Aunque no fue declarada oficialmente, la alianza militar tripartita EE.UU.-Japon-Sur de Corea existe realmente y funciona plenamente causando serios peligros.
					
					EE.UU. elaboro ya con Japon el "plan de operacion conjunta" suponiendo el "tiempo de emergencia" en la Peninsula Coreana y con el Sur de Corea, los planes de guerra contra la RPDC que se modifican y se complementan constantemente.
					
					La meta mas importante de EE.UU. en la estrategia sobre Asia-Pacifico es satisfacer su ambicion agresiva al desatar primero la guerra nuclear contra la RPDC en el Sur de Corea, colindado con el continente asiatico, y atacar a los paises regionales con las fuerzas unidas con Japon y el Sur de Corea poniendo en funcion la alianza militar tripartita.
